Text:
Here is the cover of my personal HD scan of the Entertainment Weekly Avatar Issue. The entire avatar content from the magazine is included in the torrent.

http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/5697/001cover.jpg

Despite what ThePirateBay is reporting, my torrent client is reporting 36 seeders so far.

Just thought I'd let you all know. I am still seeding at 200kbps-600kbps but it averages out at 230kbps.
Thanks and please seed all Media Packs!

Great job, can not miss the collection of fans of Avatar, thanks for sharing!
Excellent quality video, audio and pictures!
